verses.name: 2 Chronicles 28:25
verses.text: And in every several city of Judah he made high places to burn incense unto other gods, and provoked to anger the Lord God of his fathers.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 28:26
verses.text: Now the rest of his acts and of all his ways, first and last, behold, they are written in the book of the kings of Judah and Israel.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 28:27
verses.text: And Ahaz slept with his fathers, and they buried him in the city, even in Jerusalem: but they brought him not into the sepulchres of the kings of Israel: and Hezekiah his son reigned in his stead.
